creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: standing lady wearing a robe with sleeves covering her hands; seated baby in the crook of her PR arm; hairstyle with two \"wings\" and coiled topknot; very rosy cheeks; red and yellow pigment traces with red straps on baby\'s garment; applied plant fibers (?) on hair
medium: Slip coated earthenware with traces of pigment
title: Court Lady Holding a Child
